derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from French, literally hairy caterpillar', from Latin canicula 'small dog', diminutive of canis

entry.def: Chenille is cloth or clothing made from a type of thick furry thread.

means.word_mean: 1. a soft tufted cord used in embroidery
2. a heavy fabric woven with chenille cord; used in rugs and bedspreads
